uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data
Class StoreItem

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.StoreItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Item
public class StoreItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements Item

Implementation of Item interface. It consists of description (e. g. "Beer"), and price (e. g. "2.99", in BigDecimal).

Author:
Kamil Mrowiec

Constructor Detail

StoreItem

public StoreItem()
Empty constructor, needed for the class to be XML-serializable.

StoreItem

public StoreItem(java.lang.String description,
                 java.lang.String price)
Constructor for Store item. Although price is held as BigDecimal, the constructor takes String, to improve purity of the code. ProductType, in this case, is set to NON_SPECIFIED.

Parameters:
description - Items description.
price - Price of the item.

StoreItem

public StoreItem(java.lang.String description,
                 java.lang.String price,
                 ProductType pt)
Another constructor. In addition to the previous one, it also takes ProductType.

Parameters:
description - Items description.
price - Price of the item.
pt - Type of the product.
